tags.name: ef-header
tags.description:
Use to identify and separate different sections of a page.
Headers helps to organize the page layout content into
a sensible hierarchy and improve the user experience.

slots.name: left
slots.description: Slot to add custom contents to the left side of header e.g. ef-icon, ef-checkbox

slots.name: right
slots.description: Slot to add custom contents to the right side of header e.g. ef-icon, ef-checkbox
